title: Fire Detection System
description: A state-of-the-art CNN-based fire detection model built with MobileNetV2 architecture, achieving over 98% accuracy in real-time fire detection. Optimized for mobile deployment with efficient resource utilization.

title: Machine Learning Models Portfolio
description: Collection of 10+ machine learning models covering various domains including classification, regression, and clustering problems.

title: Computer Vision Applications
description: Various computer vision projects including object detection, image classification, and image processing using deep learning techniques.

title: Data Analysis Projects
description: Comprehensive data analysis projects using statistical methods and data visualization to extract meaningful insights from complex datasets.

title: Deep Learning Research
description: Research and implementation of advanced deep learning architectures including neural networks, CNNs, and RNNs for various AI applications.
